title: American Horror Story 8: Apocalypse // Promo #1 (official teaser trailer)
author: American Horror Story 10
comment: You can find this soundtrack HERE --> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9F6oZu0CisU
The part of the scorpions means the fight from evil and goodness

ok, this teaser is my new favourite. it is not just beutiful and satisfying to watch, because everything perfectly adds itself to the last scene, the music is beautiful fitting and the teaser is having a really good atmosphere
The song is Devil's Playground by The Rigs if you were wondering.
description:
American Horror Story 8 // Promo #1: It's time.
Premieres Wednesday September 12th, 2018.
